title: Strengthening Learning Design Practice Competencies: Social Problem-Solving Learning Projects Through Digital Game Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary physics concepts (Newton’s three laws), smartphone app usage experience, and team project collaboration skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can complete a social problem-solving simulation game using smartphone-based game development tools.
Learners can explain the implementation of physics systems applying Newton’s laws of motion during the game development process.
Learners can provide specific feedback on educational elements and interaction design aspects during peer evaluation of games.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
